methods.name: ShowNotification
methods.description: Shows a toast notification with the specified message

methods.name: ShowNotificationWithTitle
methods.description: Shows a toast notification with title and message

methods.name: SetTitle
methods.description: Sets the notification title text

methods.name: GetTitle
methods.description: Gets the current notification title text

methods.name: SetMessage
methods.description: Sets the notification message text

methods.name: GetMessage
methods.description: Gets the current notification message text

methods.name: SetDuration
methods.description: Sets the display duration in milliseconds (default: 3000)

methods.name: GetDuration
methods.description: Gets the current display duration in milliseconds

methods.name: SetPosition
methods.description: Sets the notification position: TopLeft, TopCenter, TopRight, BottomLeft, BottomCenter, BottomRight, Center

methods.name: GetPosition
methods.description: Gets the current notification position

methods.name: SetNotificationType
methods.description: Sets the notification type: Info, Success, Warning, Error

methods.name: GetNotificationType
methods.description: Gets the current notification type

methods.name: SetBackgroundColor
methods.description: Sets the background color for the notification (hex format, e.g. #FF6600)

methods.name: GetBackgroundColor
methods.description: Gets the current background color

methods.name: SetTextColor
methods.description: Sets the text color for the notification (hex format)

methods.name: GetTextColor
methods.description: Gets the current text color

methods.name: SetImagePath
methods.description: Sets the image from a file path (PNG, JPG, BMP, ICO)

methods.name: GetImagePath
methods.description: Gets the current image file path

methods.name: ClearImage
methods.description: Clears the custom image, reverting to the notification type icon

methods.name: DismissNotification
methods.description: Dismisses any currently visible notification

methods.name: GetIsVisible
methods.description: Returns whether a notification is currently visible

methods.name: About
methods.description: Displays control name and version information in a MessageBox

methods.name: SetSoundEnabled
methods.description: Enables or disables playing a sound when a notification is shown

methods.name: GetSoundEnabled
methods.description: Gets whether sound is enabled

methods.name: SetSoundPath
methods.description: Sets a custom WAV file path for the notification sound. Empty string uses the default system sound.

parameters.name: wavFilePath
parameters.description: Path to WAV file, or empty for system default

methods.name: GetSoundPath
methods.description: Gets the current custom WAV file path

methods.name: SetOpacity
methods.description: Sets the notification opacity (0-100, where 100 is fully opaque). Default: 100

methods.name: GetOpacity
methods.description: Gets the current notification opacity (0-100)

methods.name: SetPinned
methods.description: Sets whether the notification stays visible until manually dismissed (true = sticky)

methods.name: GetPinned
methods.description: Gets whether notifications are pinned (sticky)

events.name: NotificationShown
events.description: Fired when a notification is shown

events.name: NotificationDismissed
events.description: Fired when a notification is dismissed (auto-timeout or manual)

events.name: NotificationClicked
events.description: Fired when the user clicks on the notification

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The notification title that was clicked
